message.entry: 目标必须为标量图窗或坐标区。
颜色必须为 RGB 三元组的三列矩阵、关键字 'default'、字符向量元胞数组或字符串数组。
''{0}'' is not a valid value. Use one of these values: 'gem' | 'gem12' | 'glow' | 'glow12' | 'dye' | 'earth' | 'meadow' | 'reef' | 'sail'.
First argument must be a scalar logical value.
Specify the line styles as "mixedstyles", "mixedmarkers", or as a string array or a cell array of character vectors containing valid line or marker specifiers.
